element.short: The resource type(s) this search parameter applies to
element.definition: The base resource type(s) that this search parameter can be used against.
element.comment: A search parameter must always have at least one type. When search parameters have more than one resource, they can be used against any of the listed resource types, or in a cross-type search (see [Cross Resource Search](http.html#xres-search)).

binding.description: One of the resource types defined as part of FHIR.
